description:
Powerful text editing tool

Powerful text editing tool with syntax highlighting support for programming languages and scripts, multi-caret and synchronized editing, code/text folding, over 600 options for customizing, over 100 ready made skins, ChatGPT, spell checker, image/PDF view, Markdown/RTF/SVG preview, character map, numerical unit convert tool, text compare, JSON/SQL/XML formatter, support for multiple directories (also SFTP) and search results, etc.
- Added encoding naming options for editor
- Added madExcept 5.2.0 - https://www.madshi.net/madExceptDescription.htm
- Added show dividers option for status bar (default false)
- Added show editor theme option for status bar (default false)
- Added show highlighter option for status bar (default false)
- Added show last folder option for editor tabs (default false)
- Fixed AI chat
- Fixed and optimized replace
- Fixed and refactored AlphaControls - https://www.alphaskins.com/
- Fixed highlighters
- Fixed -noskin issues
- Fixed output refresh
- Fixed sibebar menu options
- Fixed skin selector
- Fixed splitter
- Fixed SVG preview options
- Fixed text editor control - https://github.com/TextEditorPro/TTextEditor
- Fixed word wrap
- Refactored about dialog
- Refactored licence dialog
- Refactored status bar
- Updated Inno Setup 6.6.0 - https://jrsoftware.org/
- Updated language files
- Updated PDFium 144.0.7520.0 binaries (DLL files) - https://github.com/bblanchon/pdfium-binaries

Note! This product is always completely FREE for you. See the license.
